header.subtitle: Consistently rated as excellent by 225-55r17 drivers
Most popular among drivers in PA
Check out the sale price on this tire
Consistently rated as excellent by 225-55r17 drivers

content.body:
### Shop 225/55R17 Tire Size 225/55R17 tires are commonly used on coupes and sedans, and there’s a good chance your car has this tire size if you drive a Chevrolet Malibu, Mini Cooper Countryman, Subaru Legacy, Mazda 6, Acura TLX, Mercedes-Benz E350, or BMW 528i. A brand new version of any of these cars might come with a set of Goodyear Assurance Fuel Max, Continental PremiumContact 6 - SSR, Yokohama Avid GT S35B, Yokohama Advan A83A, Goodyear Eagle LS-2, [Pirelli Cinturato P7 All Season](https://simpletire.com/brands/pirelli-tires/cinturato-p7-all-season), or Continental ContiProContact - SSR tires attached thanks to their ability to perform at a high-level year-round. Popular vehicles: 2013-2022 Chevrolet Malibu
2017-2022 Mini Cooper Countryman
2015-2022 Subaru Legacy
2014-2021 Mazda 6
2015-2020 Acura TLX
2020 Mercedes-Benz E350
2011-2016 BMW 528i Most drivers use all-season tires thanks to their ability to perform well in dry, wet, and light winter weather conditions. If you’re looking for a new set of 225/55R17 all-season tires for a coupe or sedan, check out the Bridgestone Ecopia EP422, Michelin Defender T+H, [Yokohama Avid Ascend LX](https://simpletire.com/brands/yokohama-tires/avid-ascend-lx), or GT Radial Maxtour LX for strong traction and performance year-round. Do you drive a sporty car like the BMW 528i or Mercedes-Benz E350? While all-season tires are a great choice for these vehicles, some drivers prefer ultra-high-performance tires thanks to their sporty handling and control. Consider the [Contientnal ExtremeContact DWS06 PLUS](https://simpletire.com/brands/continental-tires/extremecontact-dws06-plus), Toyo Proxes 4 Plus, BFGoodrich g-Force COMP-2 A/S+, or Firestone Firehawk Indy 500 if you’re looking for a set of 225/55R17 ultra-high-performance tires. While all-season tires are built to perform year-round, they sometimes struggle in harsh winter weather such as heavy ice and snow and very low temperatures. Fortunately, winter tires are built with a flexible rubber compound that allows them to grip the road in lower temperatures. If you live in an area that features frigid winters and heavy ice and snow, you might want to take a look at winter tires such as General Altimax Arctic 12, Nokian Nordman 7, Falken Winterpeak F-Ice 1, or [Toyo Observe G3-Ice](https://simpletire.com/brands/toyo-tires/observe-g3-ice). Each tire is Three Peak Mountain Snowflake certified for use in severe winter weather conditions, meaning that they’re more than capable of handling lower temperatures and heavy ice and snow. Whether you drive a Chevrolet Malibu, Mazda 6, BMW 528i, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 225/55R17 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
